You can apply it one of two ways:

1. Mix the booster with our Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men, Daily Defense Face Moisturizer, Resurfacing Anti Aging Cream or Revitalizing Anti Aging Cream and apply directly to your face and neck, using about 6-8 drops of the booster per ounce of the cream you are mixing it with.
book: 3129-Brickell Men's Products, Vitamin C Booster for Men

chunk: 2. Alternatively, you can apply a pea size amount (1-2 drops) of the booster directly onto your entire face. Make sure to cover the entire face down into the neck. Follow with a light application of our Daily Essential Face Moisturizer for Men or Revitalizing Anti Aging Cream.
book: 3129-Brickell Men's Products, Vitamin C Booster for Men
